metadata.description: A curated collection of Claude Code skills for vibe coding workflows

plugins.name: contextual-illustrator
plugins.description: Generate context-aware illustrations using Gemini 3 Pro Image via OpenRouter or fal.ai. Analyzes surrounding content (text, tone, purpose) to produce images that fit naturally â€” hero images, inline illustrations, diagrams, and more. Supports dual-backend auto-routing by API key.

plugins.name: web-explorer
plugins.description: Access the internet to read, search, and research. Fetch any URL as clean LLM-friendly markdown, search the web with full content extraction, or run deep multi-step research for complex questions.
